meanings.sent1: My papas helps me ride my bike.
meanings.sent2: I love spending time with my papas.
meanings.sent3: When my papas tells jokes, I can't stop laughing.
meanings.sent4: My papas is the captain of our family ship.
meanings.sent5: Every night, my papas reads me a bedtime story.

meanings.sent1: I enjoy eating papas with butter.
meanings.sent2: The restaurant served delicious papas with the steak.
meanings.sent3: The papas in the stew were like little surprises in every bite.
meanings.sent4: The papas in the field stood like soldiers in formation.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of roasted papas filled the kitchen.
